H0.text: Which river originates in the Taurus Mountains, and flows through Syria and Iraq. Euphrates River is excluded as per your request, so let's consider the Orontes River

H1.text: Which river originates in the Taurus Mountains, and flows through Syria and Iraq. Khabur River

H2.text: Which river originates in the Taurus Mountains, and flows through Syria and Iraq. Great Zab River

H3.text: Which river originates in the Taurus Mountains, and flows through Syria and Iraq. פרת
